original_title: พระ เด็ก เสือ ไก่ วอก
overview: Counting back 100 years, in October 1905, King Chulalongkorn announced the abolition of slavery. that same day 8 poor rural boys and girls who are slaves Therefore, it was sold to Jonson, an English merchant who came to buy myrrh and herbal forests. Prepare to be transported to the ship Farmers could not resist the great influence of Father Yai Phu. farmers had to gather money, gold, precious little things, hire 5 outlaw nomads to go out to help their children.
title: The Magnificent Five
